author: ovid11
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm exploring methods to determine which types of validators (such as those from SSV, Lido, etc.) are responsible for producing specific blocks. One potential approach I've thought about is examining the graffiti data. 

Could you kindly share your thoughts on whether this approach is effective, or suggest any alternative methods that might be more efficient? I deeply value your expertise and am eager to learn from your experiences.
